title: Technology Stack
text: Our main development stack is based on industry-standard technologies, used by big companies like Airbnb, Instagram, Slack, and many others. It can be an enormous advantage for your new venture with trouble-free code maintenance and supporting it for further implementations.

Every project is unique and deserves
special attention.

Some projects have specific requirements. We will use our 15+ years of experience to identify the best tech fit to solve your particular problem. You may remain focused on the business strategy and vision for the future, and we will deal with everything else.
